Ok

thought: To craft a crossbow, I first need to craft the ingredients required for the crossbow recipe. The crossbow recipe requires a tripwire_hook, string, and iron_ingot, which we have in the inventory. It also requires a stick, which can be crafted from bamboo, which we also have in the inventory. However, the recipe also requires birch_planks, which we do not have. Therefore, I will first craft birch_planks from stripped_birch_wood, which we have in slot 22. I will move the stripped_birch_wood to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 1 with quantity 1
